t: Infrastructure - Haats and Warehouses | TRIFED - Tribes India | PMVDY
s: Tribal commerce is transacted at the haat bazaars and tribal-centric intervention, therefore, has to begin here. A tribal-centric micro-market reform, for the Haat Bazars located deep inside the forest is needed. The majority of the existing Haat bazaars, however, largely remain unorganized.
